function_test_lex_hash_vector_norm_non_e.name: test_lex_hash_vector_norm_non_empty
function_test_lex_hash_vector_norm_non_e.content:
def test_lex_hash_vector_norm_non_empty():
    vec = ing._lex_hash_vector("foo bar baz foo")
    # Non-empty input should be L2-normalized to ~1.0
    norm = math.sqrt(sum(v * v for v in vec))
    assert 0.98 <= norm <= 1.02

function_test_lex_hash_vector_determinis.name: test_lex_hash_vector_deterministic
function_test_lex_hash_vector_determinis.content:
def test_lex_hash_vector_deterministic():
    v1 = ing._lex_hash_vector("symbols_and_identifiers")
    v2 = ing._lex_hash_vector("symbols_and_identifiers")
    assert v1 == v2

function_test_lex_hash_vector_dim_21.name: test_lex_hash_vector_dim
function_test_lex_hash_vector_dim_21.content:
def test_lex_hash_vector_dim():
    dim = int(getattr(ing, "LEX_VECTOR_DIM", 4096))
    vec = ing._lex_hash_vector("x")
    assert len(vec) == dim
